cause.description:
I need a turntable Cdj 200 pioneer. why? because owning this turntable will help me develop my dj skills to a top level, and that way more people wiill enjoy new mixes all over the world and be more happy!.. help me achieve my cause.. and help other people grow happier at the same time! FOR TRANCE´s SAKE!
1. Marianne really wants a turntable
2. The world needs more dj´s (even more)
cause.name: Help me buy my turntable
